attributes.action: Centralised Registration of all PPI, Claims and Sales Phone Numbers
attributes.additional_details: All 'cold calling' (PPI, Cliams, Accidents and Injury) companies to be legally required to have the telephone numbers they use registered on a central database linked to their UK office address and business contact details.  The databse would be searchable by the public to allow public members to request a stop on calls to their number.  Aligned with this a registration fee for all companies using 'cold calling' or 'telephone dialling' equipment which would pay for the above database service.
